description.english: Wake Up.
description.german: Wach auf.
description.spanish: Despierta.
description.japanese: 起きる。
description.portuguese: Acorde.

displayName.japanese: まだ、ここにいる・・・

description.english: Prevent the crash caused by the Kid.
description.german: Verhindere den Unfall, der durch das Kind verursacht wurde.
description.spanish: Evita el accidente provocado por el niño.
description.japanese: 子供が起こした事故を避ける。
description.portuguese: Impeça o acidente causado pela criança.

displayName.japanese: 十分じゃなかったのか？

description.english: Prevent the crash caused by the Best Friend.
description.german: Verhindere den Unfall, der durch die beste Freundin verursacht wurde.
description.french: Empêcher l'accident provoqué par la Meilleure amie.
description.italian: Evita l'incidente causato dalla Migliore amica.
description.spanish: Evita el accidente provocado por la mejor amiga.
description.russian: Не дайте Лучшей подруге устроить аварию.
description.japanese: 親友が起こした事故を避ける。
description.portuguese: Impeça o acidente causado pela melhor amiga.

displayName.french: Pourquoi est-ce que ça ne marche pas?

description.english: Prevent the crash caused by the Hunter.
description.german: Verhindere den Unfall, der durch den Jäger verursacht wurde.
description.french: Empêcher l'accident provoqué par le Chasseur.
description.spanish: Evita el accidente provocado por el cazador.
description.japanese: ハンターが起こした事故を避ける。
description.portuguese: Impeça o acidente causado pelo caçador.

displayName.german: Manche Dinge kann man nicht ändern
displayName.french: Certaines choses ne peuvent être changées
displayName.spanish: Hay cosas que no se pueden cambiar
displayName.japanese: 変えられないこともある

description.english: Deliver the gift.
description.german: Gib das Geschenk ab.
description.spanish: Entrega el regalo.
description.japanese: プレゼントを届ける。
description.portuguese: Entregue o presente.

displayName.french: Tu ne pouvais rien faire pour empêcher ça

description.english: Prevent the crash caused by June.
description.german: Verhindere den Unfall, der durch June verursacht wurde.
description.spanish: Evita el accidente provocado por June.
description.schinese: 阻止 June 引发的车祸。
description.japanese: Juneが起こした事故を避ける。
description.portuguese: Impeça o acidente causado por June.

displayName.japanese: しばらくお待ちください

description.english: Accepted the truth.
description.german: Akzeptiere die Tatsachen.
description.spanish: Has aceptado la verdad.
description.japanese: 真実を受け入れる。
description.portuguese: Aceite a verdade.

description.english: See the epilogue.
description.german: Sieh dir den Epilog an.
description.spanish: Ve el epílogo.
description.japanese: 終幕を見る。
description.portuguese: Assista ao epílogo.

displayName.italian: Il fiore tra i suoi capelli
displayName.portuguese: Ela tem uma flor no cabelo

description.english: Give June a flower.
description.german: Gib June eine Blume.
description.spanish: Dale una flor a June.
description.japanese: Juneに花をあげる。
description.portuguese: Entregue a flor para June.

displayName.german: Die, die nicht mehr da sind

description.english: Open the gate to the Graveyard.
description.german: Öffne das Tor zum Friedhof.
description.spanish: Abre la puerta al cementerio.
description.japanese: 墓地の門を開く。
description.portuguese: Abra o portão para o cemitério.

description.english: Look at every viewable in Carl and June's house.
description.german: Finde jedes Bild in Carls und Junes Haus.
description.french: Trouver tous les tableaux dans la maison de Carl et de June.
description.italian: Trova tutti i quadri in casa di Carl e June.
description.koreana: 칼과 준의 집에서 그림을 모두 찾으세요.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los cuadros en la casa de Carl y June.
description.schinese: 找到 Carl 和 June 家中的所有绘画。
description.russian: Найдите все картины в доме Carl и June.
description.japanese: CarlとJuneの家で全ての絵を見つける。
description.portuguese: Encontre todas as pinturas na casa de Carl e June.

displayName.german: In guten und in schlechten Tagen,
displayName.french: Pour le meilleur et pour le pire,
displayName.spanish: En la salud y en la enfermedad
displayName.japanese: 健やかなる時も病める時も、

description.english: Listened to every diorama.
description.german: Höre dir jedes Diorama an.
description.french: Tous les dioramas ont été écoutés.
description.spanish: Has oído todos los dioramas.
description.japanese: 全てのジオラマを聞く。
description.portuguese: Escutou todos os dioramas.

description.english: Peek at Carl and June at the Lake
description.german: Beobachte Carl und June am See.
description.french: Apercevoir Carl et June au Lac.
description.italian: Sbircia Carl e June al lago.
description.spanish: Espía a Carl y June en el lago.
description.schinese: 在湖边偷看 Carl 和 June。
description.russian: Подсмотрите за Carl и June на озере.
description.japanese: 湖でCarlとJuneを覗き見する。
description.portuguese: Espie Carl e June no lago.

description.english: Try to involve Teddy in the surprise.
description.german: Versuche, Teddy in die Überraschung mit einzubeziehen.
description.french: Essayer d'impliquer Nounours dans la surprise.
description.italian: Cerca di coinvolgere Teddy nella sorpresa.
description.spanish: Intenta que el osito participe en la sorpresa.
description.russian: Устройте сюрприз вместе с плюшевым мишкой Тедди.
description.japanese: テディーベアーでびっくりさせてみる。
description.portuguese: Tente fazer Teddy participar da surpresa.

displayName.english: She Loves Me, She Loves Me Not
displayName.german: Sie liebt mich, sie liebt mich nicht
displayName.portuguese: Ela me ama, ela não me ama

description.english: Pick every petal of a single flower.
description.german: Zupfe jedes Blütenblatt einer Blume ab.
description.italian: Strappa ogni petalo di un singolo fiore.
description.koreana: 꽃 한 송이에서 꽃잎으로 모두 떼어내세요.
description.spanish: Recoge todos los pétalos de una misma flor.
description.schinese: 摘下一朵花的每个花瓣。
description.japanese: 全ての花びらをひろう。
description.portuguese: Tire todas as pétalas de uma única flor.

displayName.spanish: No se me da bien el baloncesto

description.english: Shoot the ball at the basketball hoop four times.
description.german: Wirf den Ball viermal in den Basketballkorb.
description.french: Viser le panier de basket quatre fois.
description.italian: Tira la palla al canestro quattro volte.
description.spanish: Lanza cuatro veces la pelota de baloncesto a la canasta.
description.russian: Попадите по кольцу мячом четыре раза.
description.japanese: バスケットボールのフープにボールを４回投げる。
description.portuguese: Jogue a bola na cesta quatro vezes.

displayName.english: The Boy Who Lost His Friend
displayName.german: Der Junge, der seinen Freund verloren hat
displayName.french: Le garçon qui avait perdu son ami
displayName.italian: Il ragazzo che perse il suo amico
displayName.spanish: El chico que perdió una amistad
displayName.japanese: 友だちをなくした男の子
displayName.portuguese: O menino que perdeu um amigo

description.english: Collect every memory of the Kid.
description.german: Sammele jede Erinnerung des Kindes.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le memorie del Ragazzino.
description.spanish: Obtén todos los recuerdos del niño.
description.japanese: 子供の思い出を全て集める。
description.portuguese: Adquira todas as memórias da criança.

displayName.french: C'est le moment de prendre un nouveau départ

description.english: Collect every memory of the Best Friend.
description.german: Sammele jede Erinnerung der besten Freundin.
description.french: Trouver chaque souvenir de la Meilleure amie.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i ricordi della Migliore amica.
description.spanish: Obtén todos los recuerdos de la mejor amiga.
description.japanese: 親友の思い出を全て集める。
description.portuguese: Adquira todas as memórias da melhor amiga.

displayName.english: Under The Shadow of My Father
displayName.spanish: Bajo la sombra de mi padre

description.english: Collect every memory of the Hunter.
description.german: Sammele jede Erinnerung des Jägers.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le memorie del Cacciatore.
description.spanish: Obtén todos los recuerdos del cazador.
description.japanese: ハンターの思い出を全て集める。
description.portuguese: Adquira todas as memórias do caçador.

displayName.german: Es heißt, man stirbt immer zweimal
displayName.french: On dit qu'on meurt deux fois
displayName.spanish: Se dice que morimos dos veces

description.english: Collect every memory of the Old Man.
description.german: Sammele jede Erinnerung des alten Mannes.
description.french: Trouver chaque souvenir du Vieil homme.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le memorie del Vecchio.
description.spanish: Obtén todos los recuerdos del anciano.
description.japanese: 老人の思い出を全て集める。
description.portuguese: Adquira todas as memórias do velho.

description.english: Knock over four vases.
description.german: Stoße vier Vasen um.
description.spanish: Tira cuatro jarrones.
description.japanese: 花瓶を四つ倒す。
description.portuguese: Derrube quatro vasos.
